casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Flynn, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Flynn (1999), 84 Ohio St.3d 330.]

(No. 98-2146 Submitted December 1, 1998 Decided January 20, 1999.) Russell V. Leffler, Huron County Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State v. Cook (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 404, 700 N.E.2d 570.

The trial court’s finding that Robert J. Flynn is a sexual predator is reinstated.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Resnick, J., not participating.
